text: 19.7 Mat 22.2, 25.10, Epe 5.32, Lep 21.2, 21.9 Pen Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak bin ne nop dɨnɨgab ñɨn ak owup tek,19.7 Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk bin dɨnɨgeb apun ak nɨm, ne Klays. Bin anɨb nep bɨ dɨnɨgeb apun ak nɨm, Klays binɨb ne. Klays adɨkɨd ownɨgab ñɨn ak, binɨb ne dɨnɨgab ak, anɨb ak tek kɨli dɨpil. Klays binɨb ne dad man teplep amnɨgab, ne ayɨp pelpel yenɨgabal.  bin ak bɨ dɨnɨg gɨtep gɨl mɨdeb agɨlak. Anɨb ak tep gaknɨŋ mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg, yɨb nop dad aplanɨgun agɨlak.
